Meditation Guide

Getting Started

  • •Find a quiet, comfortable space where you won't be disturbed
  • •Sit in a comfortable position with your spine straight
  • •Use headphones for the best audio experience
  • •Set aside dedicated time for your practice

Breathing Technique

  • •Follow the guided breathing pattern shown on screen
  • •Breathe through your nose slowly and deeply
  • •Let your mind follow the raga's melody
  • •Release any thoughts without judgment

Chakra Alignment

  • •Each raga is tuned to activate specific chakras
  • •Visualize the corresponding color at that chakra point
  • •Feel the energy flowing through your body
  • •Allow the frequency to resonate within you

After Meditation

  • •Sit quietly for a few moments after the session ends
  • •Slowly open your eyes and return to awareness
  • •Journal about your experience and insights
  • •Practice regularly for best results
